storyInfo: Ferdinand discovers the secret, but decides to keep it that way. Ho'olheyak goes on a killing spree. Rosmontis steps into the room, knowing that Loken is waiting for her.

attributes.content: A lot of noise. Another delivery from your Engineering Director?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Final tests will take about forty-five minutes.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Plenty.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: My greatest achievement will be complete once this data is transferred.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I will retain your research records.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: I know. Give it to that girl, Ho'olheyak, or someone else... I don't care.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Being able to finish this research here in my final days almost lets me forget all the regrets in my life.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Haha... *cough*.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I still remember how hard it was to accept when you showed this to me for the first time.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: ...hehe.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Hahaha... *cough*, *cough*...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: The irony. How it scorns every conceited researcher who walked the halls of science for the past few centuries.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: It laughs in the face of our research, made all it worthless...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: What is this, Kristen?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: How are you able to speak of its theories and emerge with such confidence, when you've never performed a single experiment?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: This thing... it's beyond my understanding. Even more frightening is that all those tales you tell of these black cubes are true.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Tell me, Kristen.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Tell me! What is this that I am about to study?!
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: That's your job.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Where did you find it? How did you gain this knowledge?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Don't be so hard on a dying man, Kristen.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Who gave you this?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: ...God.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Have I overestimated you, young genius? Do you believe in ghosts and spirits, look up to the unknown in awe?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: No, you're not the kind of woman who would joke about this. You're not foolish or shameless enough for that, or to place your hopes in empty faith.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I'll take your word for it... hmph. The irony.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: 'God.'
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Another month has passed since 'God' bestowed on me his mercy.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: In this short period of time, I completed more work than I could have imagined for decades.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Hmph. Even I can't help but wonder...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: What 'miracle' do you plan to bring us... bring to the people on his land?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Kristen does not answer.
She gazes at the stars outside the window silently, lost in thought.
Another half an hour... bah, I should start thinking about supper.
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: Donut? Fried fowlbeast? Hot dog?
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: All of Trimounts is up in arms over this place, but look how carefree the heart of the storm is.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: *cough* Wh-Who are you?
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: I want the blueprints and efficiency data for the S.H.A.F.T. and the associated facilities, now.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: S-Sir, that's highly classified...
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: Do you see my clothes? My security pass right here? Or do you need me to put Blake on the line for you?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: N-No, sir, I'll put it together...
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: No need. This terminal right here. Turn it on.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: But sir, this is raw data without visualization...
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: ...I'm Ferdinand Clooney.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Rhine Lab's Director of Energy.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I designed the Trimountian energy circulation system. The processor of the terminal in front of you is based on an Originium energy conversion formula named after me.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The Clooney... Formula?! Y-You're...
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: You've wasted two minutes. Data, now.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Y-Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: Seconds pass, then minutes.
Ferdinand could almost hear the sounds of military convoys moving through the streets. Blake could find Kristen any moment.
He must hurry... for what?
Here, and here.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Have these data been manipulated?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: O-Of course not! All the data are transmitted in real-time to the army's labs! It's more than my life's worth to upload false data!
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: No one wants to get on the wrong side of the army...
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: It doesn't match.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I beg your pardon?
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: The structure of the S.H.A.F.T., the distribution of the pipelines and the performance of the existing propulsion system. None of them is right.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Just discreet enough to avoid notice... damn.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: That can't be, you must be mistaâ€”no, I suppose not, you of all people.
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: Perhaps this is a temporary plan for experimentation and development, and adjustment will be made before the official launch.
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: What's the plan for the official launch?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: H.A.M.H.R.R. should be on a mobile plate near the S.H.A.F.T.. Kristen stole the entire plate.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: But the propulsion device is still here! The army has impounded all the launchers that were under construction!
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: Even if she manipulated the data, she couldn't... not with this propulsion performance...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Unless...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Get Blake on the line.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: Now.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: This had better be important, Ferdinand, for you to bother me at a time like this.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Listen. Nasti Lunorey is one of Kristen's. The propulsion device that she designed does not have the performance to lift H.A.M.H.R.R. off the ground.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Justin Jr. must have bought out your scientists to cover up Kristen's real goal. They're working together.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: So you're telling me everyone in Rhine Lab is complicit in Kristen's suspected treason.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: I'm not...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You need to tell me something new.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: If the researcher you sent me is actually useful, then I'll drag that Control of yours from the stolen H.A.M.H.R.R. soon enough.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Which is to say, I will soon know how many insurgents there are in Rhine.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Then Rhine...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Is there anything more important that you want to report?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: No, sir.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Congratulations in advance on your successful mission, Colonel.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Close the file.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Yes, sir... is there anything else you need?
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: Do you have a maintenance aircraft? The kind that can reach H.A.M.H.R.R.'s theoretical ceiling?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Yes, we do!
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: I need to borrow it.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: But didn't you say H.A.M.H.R.R. wouldn't fly because of propulsion issues?
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: Or... can it?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: (Whisper) You're right. We took our first steps together.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: I mean, you're right. Maybe I was mistaken.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Strong Transmitter reaction. I can feel a lot of it lying ahead.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Right in the middle of urban Trimounts.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Yes, sir. The area ahead is sewage treatment and garbage disposal. Very few people live here.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: You mean Kristen Wright hid H.A.M.H.R.R. in some other building, right under our nose.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Target may have set up jammers in the area. Our guys didn't detect any signals when they passed through.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Those egghead sons of bitches and their tricks.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Should we turn the place upside-down?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: No, that'll take too much time, and draw the enemy's attention.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Can you locate it?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: I need to borrow your neural-electricity stimulator.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Do you know how to use that?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: I believe Rhine developed it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: There's no getting away from you people, is there? Give it to her.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Cranial-electricity will trigger resonance in the Transmitter inside me.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Resonance will also occur in any nearby Transmitter, strong enough for your sensors to detect.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: I-I got a reading! It's increasing in strength!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Increase output by ten percent.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Urgh... nngh...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Pre-epilepsy symptom! Should I take over? I have mech operating experience and long-range Arts Unit implants.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Her Transmitter is from Site 359. It's the only one that will work.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Pro... proceed.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I can take it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We got a stable signal!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Coordinates have been synchronized to officer terminals, sir.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Good, we know where H.A.M.H.R.R. is now.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Proceed to the target ASAP!
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Ngh... guh...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Handkerchief. Doubt you can even see through all that sweat.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Th-Thank you...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Director Jara... did the soldiers bother you?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Oh? No, just usual chit-chat.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Did you... say anything?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: ...Nothing.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: The funny thing is, I don't even know anything. I know Kristen like Kristen knows me.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I didn't sign on to her adventure, and she refused to let me risk my remaining life for her.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Control is lucky to have you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Lucky?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: No, I don't think so, Silence.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: When I look at Kristen, I don't see the inscrutable, dominating Control of Rhine... I only see a girl too proud to bow her head.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Maybe time stopped twenty years ago for both of us.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: You mean... the day when Control's parents were killed in a flight test accident?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It was supposed to be a sunny, cloudless day.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Is it regret? Remorse?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Is it because I watched them fly to their end, because I didn't check their flight plan carefullyâ€”
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Or because I didn't expect the government and capitalists would allow that sensitive little girl to become the target of all the attacks on her parents, in order to protect their name?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: No, it's neither.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: It was just one failure. Even if it was my only one, it should be nothing for an experienced agent.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: But I could never forget the look in her eyes. That ball of fire falling from the sky continues to burn in her eyes.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: It's appeared in my dreams on many a night.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I don't want to see it extinguished again.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: You left the Maylander Foundation because of Control.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: A scientist stops being a scientist when she develops an emotional attachment to her test subject, huh?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: You, of all people, should understand.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I was never a mother.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: But I have a child.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Gamma and Delta Squads in position, sir.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Everything looks normal with the target building. Scanning for potential hostiles...
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Wait, is that... a Maylander drone!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: So that's why the goddamned agents didn't show up. They were tracking our aircraft!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Why didn't they find out about the plate, then? Were they waiting for us to do our job, then pick up the scraps?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Maylander's eyes are everywhere.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Columbia has changed a lot in the past twenty years.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I used to protect people like the Wrights from conspiracy theorists and technophobes.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I suppose even the great Maylander can be wrong at times.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Look at the mad scientists out there, they're the greatest threat.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Message from Maylander, Colonel.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: They're syncing the drone's data with us. Less than ten lifeforms within ten klicks of the target.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: We had an elite squad keeping an eye on Kristen before she disappeared.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Are you telling me that a bunch of scientists and a few assistants took out an entire squad of commandos?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Maybe we went to the wrong place?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: That's not impossible for the Control I know...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Keep your eyes open. Don't let your guard dâ€”
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: What was that?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: I think we just hit something, sir!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: No, sensors aren't picking up anything.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: I-It's wind! It's a wall of wind!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: We can't maintain attitude!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Losing altitude! 500, 400, 350â€”
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Out of my way! Give me the controls!
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Th-That's the building's outer wall! We're gonna hit it!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: First one.
What happened?!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: That's the Colonel's aircraft! It fell into the buildings at 10 o'clockâ€”Gamma Squad to the crash site, now!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Did the enemy come from the air? Why didn't we get any warnings from the Maylander drones?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: No, we've lost all communications.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Maylander's eyes all went out at the same time?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Second one.
Total loss of communications with Maylander? This is FUBAR, isn't their shit supposed to be cutting-edge?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Large number of hostiles! Ten, elevenâ€”no, more!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Ambush! Raise the Colonel!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: There's too many of them!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Hold! Hold!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: The Maylander douchebags said there were less than ten! Was the data wrong, or did they screw us?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Aghâ€”!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: It's not the data that's wrong.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Colonel! You're safe!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Form up.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Gamma and Delta, pull back and find cover. Have the power armor assault team move up.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Let everyone knowâ€”
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: We're facing the latest prototype unmanned power armor.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Third one.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: The walls of the room block all screams, but the explosions can be clearly seen on the monitors.
Ho'olheyak does not look at the screen. Her eyes have not left the book since the first prey stepped into the trap.
She swings her tail back and forth in boredom, pressing one button after another, directing the show happening not far from here.
Where are you going?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: To fulfill my final wish.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Sneaking out to meet someone again? You'll die out there, and I won't be there to save you.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...... *cough* *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Don't croak before the work is done.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Otherwiseâ€”
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You can't take it from me.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: It's not ready for activation yet. Only an ugly death awaits if you *cough* rush it.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I know. I've heard that enough times.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Take it as words of wisdom from a dying man.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: You're too young to be showing the madness of the impeding end.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Time does not treat us all fairly. Go, old man, and dream your last dream before death carries you away.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Good night.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: As for me... it's time for me to deal with my last problem.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Ho'olheyak puts down the book and hooks something from the pile of books with her tail.
A metal head.
She blows lightly at the head and sees the white vapor pass through the metal shell, then dissipate into thin air without going anywhere.
It's not everyday that you get to see Maylander agents work with commandos.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Are you really sure you don't want to come back from the dead, my dear old employer?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You'll miss the best parts.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* Who's the enemy?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Only someone with the internal access codes can disable all of Maylander's eyes at the same time.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Control has someone from Maylander with her?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: An elite Maylander agent, codename Ho'olheyak. She took over the task of monitoring Kristen from me. I wasn't sure if she had turned traitor... until now.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Ho'olheyak?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yesterday.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Ho'olheyak means 'yesterday.' It's unknown whether it's her codename or the one she was born with.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Kristen brought her to Rhine Lab one year ago, saying she was Rhine Lab's new bibliology consultant.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I looked into her background but found nothing.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Maylander had concealed most of her files, of course, but that wasn't much of a problem for me.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Not even Maylander knows about her past?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It's like she popped into the world yesterday. Her knowledge, her powers, her Arts... none of them have anything to do with modern technology.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Have you ever heard the legend, from the days when the world was just a barren land?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: 'She is Liberi, she is Phidia.'
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: 'She rides with the wind and dances with the stars.'
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: 'She is the last Elder still blessed by the heavens.'
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Forward, forward!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: Stay in formation! Cover the others!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: Wait, up in the skyâ€”hostile approaching!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: Take aim!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: Energy beam... wait, how could this be? It won't fireâ€”are our weapons being attacked?
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: No, the weapon's fineâ€”it's the sky that's being affected!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator
Power Armor Operator
attributes.content: Unknown energy interference in the areaâ€”

attributes.name: Power Armor Operator
attributes.content: Argh!
A great force takes hold of him.
Even in his metal armor, the soldier feels frail and helpless, like a naked infant.
He waves his limbs futilely, but he could not control his body, or the exoskeleton wrapped around it.
He is flung like a plastic toy, smashing into another power armor.
Silver-green shadows leave the shattered armor.
A silhouette approaches slowly in the smoke.
*cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: G212Î±-13 abandoning exoskeleton! Hostile contact, s-support requestedâ€”
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: How many hostiles?
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: O-One...
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: ...One.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I'm afraid I'm the only one you're facing.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Do you need time to surrender?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Mm... we're almost there.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That's the hideout Kristen prepared for Loken.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: We walked a few hours underground.;I thought the end of the passage would look more normal.
Where did you get your info, Muelsyse?

attributes.content: I befriended a... er, straightforward engineer.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Whew... I've smelled better.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Kristen hasn't changed. You could throw her into a garbage dump when she's in the middle of an experiment, and she wouldn't care one bit.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Did you know that Saria and I picked all her clothes? Even Saria is more concerned about fashion than she is. And...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Did the army find the place?;They're fighting.

attributes.content: Drat, we don't have time!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Time for what?;Shouldn't we be more cautious?

attributes.content: Doctor... Loken is a convict with a few hundred years on his sentence. You want to take Rosmontis to see him? Then you have to beat them to it.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: How do you plan to explain to the military if they find us together?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: What's with the kitten? Is she thinking about something?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: I think she's sensitive to the battlefield environment.;There's something interfering with her thoughts.

attributes.content: Keep an eye on her, Doctor. I need to find a way in... maybe I can use my water to get in through the vents, then hack the door circuits...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: No need to look, Muelsyse.;The door's open, Rosmontis.

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Kristen built a lab inside.;Loken's lab.

attributes.content: Loken.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I remember this place.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It's not in my memory. I've never been in this corridor. But my eyes, ears, mouth, emotions... they all tell me that I've walked a path like it.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.text: Welcome home, child. Welcome to the court that I prepared for you.
